```{r libraries, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```


```{r read_in, include = FALSE}
elvs <- read_csv(here::here("data", "tidy_elvs.csv"))
elvs <- elvs %>% mutate(rs1916988 = as_factor(rs1916988))
iowa <- read_csv(here::here("data", "tidy_iowa.csv"))
iowa <- iowa %>% mutate_at(vars(starts_with("rs")), funs( as_factor(.)))
```



# 13 One way Anova:
```{r}
test <- iowa %>% select(LCOMP,rs7791396) 
#%>% drop_na(rs7791396)

test %>% group_by(rs7791396) %>% skim()

test <- iowa %>% select(LCOMP,rs7791396) %>% filter( rs7791396 != '0/0')

test %>% group_by(rs7791396) %>% skim()
anova(lm(LCOMP~ rs7791396, data=iowa))

#TEST ANOVA BETTER 
# Clears the na's 
anova(lm(LCOMP~ rs7791396, data=test))

#Find power score! 
```
